title.en: It's Been 10 Years Since You Asked to Break off Our Engagement, If You Insist That Much, Let's Break It off!

altTitles.ja: 婚約破棄を持ちかけられて十数年、そこまで言うなら破棄しましょう！

altTitles.ja-ro: Konyaku Haki wo Mochikakerarete Juusuunen, Soko Made Iu Nara Haki Shimashou!
Konyaku Haki o Mochikakerarete Juusuunen, Soko Made Iu Nara Haki Shimashou!

altTitles.zh: 被提出废除婚约已经十多年了，既然如此，那就把它废除吧!

altTitles.es: Han pasado 10 años desde que solicitaste romper nuestro compromiso, si insistes tanto, ¡terminemos!

altTitles.pt-br: Já faz 10 anos que desde que você pediu para terminar nosso noivado, se você insiste tanto assim, vamos terminar!

altTitles.hu: Már 10 éve kéred az eljegyzésünk felbontását, szóval ha ennyire akarod, akkor bontsuk fel!

altTitles.id: Sudah 10 tahun kamu meminta untuk membatalkan pertunangannya, kalau kamu bersikeras sekuat itu, yasudah batalkan saja!

altTitles.ko: 약혼 파기하자고 한 지 십수 년, 그렇게까지 말한다면 파기해요!

altTitles.th: ถามเรื่องถอนหมั้นมา 10 ปีแล้ว ถ้าจะเอาจริงก็เชิญเลยค่ะ !

altTitles.ru: Коняку хаки во мочикакерарете джуусуунен, соко маде иу нара хаки щимащоу!

altTitles.uk: Коняку гакі во мочікакерарете джуусуунен, соко маде іу нара гакі шімашоу!

altTitles.ja-ro: Konyakuhaki wo Mochikakerarete Juusuunen, Soko made Iu nara Hakishimashou

description.en:
Diana Bailey, the daughter of a duke, has been told to have her engagement broken countless times since she was young. Each time, Diana would answer to Prince Robert's demands and refine her skills, but one day, he said that being with another woman makes him feel "relaxed and calm"…?!  
  
A work published in "Though I May Be a Villainess, I'll Show You I Can Obtain Happiness! Anthology" is getting a short-term serialization due to it's popularity! A romantic love comedy that includes Prince Robert's sister, Princess Lizzy, and her fiancé Sergio is starting!
description.ja: 幼いころから何度も婚約破棄を言い渡されてきた公爵令嬢ディアナ・ベイリー。そのたびにロバート王子の要求に応えて自分を磨いてきたディアナだが、ある日ほかの女性といっしょにいるほうが「ほっとする、落ち着ける」と言われて…!?　人気イラストレーターまろが描いた『悪役令嬢ですが、幸せになってみせますわ！　アンソロジーコミック』のカバーイラストが、由村によってコミックに！　ロバート王子の妹リジー王女や、その婚約者のセルジオも交えての、大反響ロマンチックラブコメディが開幕です！
